user_prompt: create epics and user stories for the usecase

epics.title: Project Foundation and Environment Setup
epics.summary: Establish initial setup and development environment for the project.
epics.description: This epic covers the essential groundwork needed to begin the project. It includes setting up the repository, configuring environments, selecting the tech stack, and defining architecture guidelines. The outcome of this epic ensures that all team members have a consistent, ready-to-use foundation for development.

epics.title: Create Version Control Repository
epics.summary: Set up a centralized code repository.
epics.description: As a developer, I want to create and configure a version control repository so that all project code can be stored, tracked, and collaboratively developed.

epics.title: Set Up Development Environments
epics.description: As a team, we need consistent development, testing, and staging environments configured to match the production setup so the deployment process is smooth and error-free.

epics.title: User Authentication and Profiles
epics.summary: Implement secure sign-up, login, and profile management.
epics.description: This epic focuses on developing a secure authentication system, user registration, multi-factor authentication, password recovery, and profile management features. The goal is to ensure a reliable, safe, and seamless login experience for all users.

epics.title: User Registration
epics.description: As a new user, I want to register using my credentials or social login so that I can access application features after authentication.

epics.title: Password Reset Functionality
epics.summary: Allow users to reset their password securely.
epics.description: As a user, I want to reset my password securely via an email or SMS verification process so that I can regain access to my account without compromising security.

epics.title: Core Business Features Development
epics.summary: Develop main application functionalities supporting the business purpose.
epics.description: This epic encompasses the creation of the project's core functionalities that fulfill the main business objectives. It includes building the internal logic, feature modules, and supporting workflows needed for users to achieve their goals effectively.

epics.title: Feature Implementation
epics.description: As a user, I want to perform the core actions that the application enables so that I can achieve the intended tasks efficiently and accurately.

epics.title: Error Handling and Validation
epics.summary: Ensure all user inputs and workflows are validated.
epics.description: As a user, I want the application to validate my input and provide clear error messages so that I can easily correct mistakes and continue using the system seamlessly.

epics.title: User Interface and Experience
epics.summary: Deliver a responsive, user-friendly, and engaging interface.
epics.description: This epic is focused on building intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces that enhance usability. The scope includes responsive layouts, accessibility compliance, consistent styling, and improved navigation flows.

epics.title: Responsive Design Implementation
epics.summary: Ensure layouts work across all devices.
epics.description: As a user, I want the interface to adapt seamlessly to my device so that I can use the application whether I'm on a mobile, tablet, or desktop.

epics.title: Accessibility Compliance
epics.summary: Ensure the platform is accessible to all users.
epics.description: As a user with disabilities, I want to interact with the system through accessible features like keyboard navigation and screen reader support so that I have an equitable user experience.

epics.title: Testing, Quality Assurance, and Release Preparation
epics.summary: Test, refine, and prepare the application for release.
epics.description: This epic covers the implementation of comprehensive quality assurance procedures, including unit, integration, and user acceptance testing. The goal is to ensure all modules work correctly and the product is stable and deployable.

epics.title: Functional Testing
epics.description: As a QA engineer, I want to validate that all developed features behave as expected under various conditions so that the system remains robust.

epics.title: User Acceptance Testing
epics.description: As a stakeholder, I want to review the system against requirements so that I can approve the product for deployment.

epics.title: Deployment, Analytics, and Monitoring
epics.summary: Deploy the system and establish performance tracking.
epics.description: This epic focuses on the deployment of the production-ready system. It includes setting up CI/CD pipelines, integrating monitoring tools, and implementing analytics to monitor performance, user engagement, and potential system bottlenecks post-launch.

epics.title: Application Deployment
epics.summary: Deploy the tested application into production.
epics.description: As a DevOps engineer, I want to deploy the stable build of the application into production so that users can begin using the live system.

epics.title: Integrate Analytics
epics.summary: Enable tracking of user behavior and system metrics.
epics.description: As a product manager, I want analytics integrated into the system to monitor engagement and performance so that I can make informed decisions for future improvements.

user_stories.title: Setup project repository and folder structure
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to set up the project repository and folder structure, so that the project has a standardized starting point.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure the repository is created in the version control system. The folder structure should follow industry best practices and project-specific requirements.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The project repository is created and initialized with a basic folder structure.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a new project, when the repository is created and folder structure is set up, then the basic configuration should be present in the version control system.

user_stories.title: Configure project environment
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to configure the project environment, so that the development and deployment processes are standardized.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Environment configuration should include setting up development, testing, and production environments with necessary variables and settings.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Development, testing, and production environments are configured properly.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a new project, when the environment is configured, then all necessary environment variables and settings should be present and correct.

user_stories.title: Define architecture patterns and coding guidelines
user_stories.description: As a lead developer, I want to define architecture patterns and coding guidelines, so that the project is scalable and maintainable.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Architecture patterns should be suitable for the project scope and future growth. Coding guidelines should be documented and shared with the team.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Architecture patterns and coding guidelines are defined and documented.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a new project, when the architecture patterns and coding guidelines are defined, then they should be documented and accessible to all team members.

user_stories.title: Set up continuous integration pipelines
user_stories.description: As a DevOps engineer, I want to set up continuous integration pipelines, so that the project can be automatically built and tested.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Continuous integration pipelines should be set up using industry-standard tools and should include automated builds and tests.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Continuous integration pipelines are set up and integrated with the repository.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a new project, when the continuous integration pipelines are set up, then automated builds and tests should be performed on each commit.

user_stories.title: Implement user registration
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to register for an account, so that I can access the platform.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: User registration should include input validation and email verification.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User can register for an account with valid credentials.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a new user, when the registration form is completed correctly, then the user should receive a verification email.

user_stories.title: Implement user login
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to log in, so that I can access my account.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: User login should validate credentials and establish a session.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User can log in with valid credentials and a session is created.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a registered user, when they log in with valid credentials, then a session should be established and user redirected to the dashboard.

user_stories.title: Implement password reset functionality
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to reset my password, so that I can regain access if I forget it.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Password reset should include email verification and secure token generation.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User can reset their password using a secure token sent to their email.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a registered user, when they request a password reset, then they should receive an email with a reset link and token.

user_stories.title: Implement role-based access control
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to manage user roles, so that I can control access to different parts of the application.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Role-based access control should differentiate between admin and regular user roles.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Admins can assign and manage roles for users.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an admin user, when they assign roles to other users, then access to application features should be controlled based on roles.

user_stories.title: Implement core feature flows
user_stories.description: As a product owner, I want to have the core feature flows implemented, so that the application fulfills its primary purpose.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Core feature flows should be defined and implemented based on business requirements.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Core feature flows are implemented and functional.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the core features, when implemented and tested, then they should operate according to the specified business logic and requirements.

user_stories.title: Ensure seamless data flow between front-end and back-end
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to ensure seamless data flow between front-end and back-end, so that the application performs efficiently.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Data flow should be seamless and efficient, with minimal latency and data integrity.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Data flows seamlessly between front-end and back-end.
user_stories.test_cases: Given core features, when data is processed, then it should flow seamlessly between front-end and back-end systems.

user_stories.title: Design and integrate APIs for CRUD operations
user_stories.description: As a back-end developer, I want to design and integrate APIs for CRUD operations, so that the application can manage data efficiently.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: APIs should be efficient, properly documented, and include error handling mechanisms.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: APIs for CRUD operations are designed, integrated, and documented.
user_stories.test_cases: Given CRUD operations, when APIs are called, then they should perform the intended operations efficiently and handle errors correctly.

user_stories.title: Establish database connections and data modeling
user_stories.description: As a database architect, I want to establish database connections and data modeling, so that data is stored and retrieved efficiently.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Data modeling should follow best practices to ensure efficiency and scalability.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Database connections are established and data models are designed.
user_stories.test_cases: Given database requirements, when connections and models are set up, then data should be stored and retrieved efficiently.

user_stories.title: Introduce and optimize responsive layouts
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the application to have a responsive layout, so that I can use it on any device.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Layouts should be fully responsive and optimized for different device sizes.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Responsive layouts are implemented and optimized.
user_stories.test_cases: Given different devices, when accessing the application, then the layout should be responsive and user-friendly.

user_stories.title: Optimize loading patterns and accessible design
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to optimize loading patterns and ensure accessible design, so that the application is fast and usable by all users.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Loading patterns should be optimized for speed. Design should be accessible following WCAG guidelines.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Loading patterns are optimized and design is made accessible.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the application, when loading resources, then they should load quickly and the design should be accessible to all users.

user_stories.title: Conduct unit, integration, and user acceptance testing
user_stories.description: As a QA engineer, I want to conduct unit, integration, and user acceptance testing, so that the application meets quality standards.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Tests should cover all major functionalities and use cases. Any defects should be documented and addressed.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: All major functionalities and use cases are tested and meet the quality standards.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the application features, when tested through unit, integration, and UAT, then they should perform correctly with no critical defects.

user_stories.title: Prepare deployment pipelines and documentation
user_stories.description: As a DevOps engineer, I want to prepare deployment pipelines and documentation, so that the release process is smooth and well-documented.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Deployment pipelines should be automated. Documentation should cover all aspects of the release process.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Deployment pipelines are prepared and documentation is complete.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the application, when preparing for deployment, then the pipelines should be ready and documentation should cover the release process comprehensively.

user_stories.title: Integrate analytics tools
user_stories.description: As a product manager, I want to integrate analytics tools, so that I can track user behavior and application metrics.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Analytics tools should cover all necessary user interactions and performance metrics.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Analytics tools are integrated and configured.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the application, when analytics tools are integrated, then user interactions and performance metrics should be tracked accurately.

user_stories.title: Implement performance monitoring systems
user_stories.description: As a system admin, I want to implement performance monitoring systems, so that I can track system performance and identify issues.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Monitoring systems should provide real-time insights into system performance and error tracking.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Performance monitoring systems are implemented and configured.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the application, when performance monitoring systems are implemented, then system performance and errors should be tracked in real-time.

user_stories.title: Implement advanced functionalities
user_stories.description: As a product owner, I want to implement advanced functionalities, so that the application offers enhanced capabilities.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Advanced functionalities should enhance user experience and capabilities.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Advanced functionalities are implemented and functional.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the application, when advanced functionalities are implemented, then they should enhance user experience and meet specified capabilities.

user_stories.title: Continuously refine system components based on feedback
user_stories.description: As a product manager, I want to continuously refine system components based on feedback, so that the application evolves and delivers ongoing value.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Refinements should be based on user feedback and analytics data.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: System components are continuously refined and improved.
user_stories.test_cases: Given user feedback and analytics data, when refining system components, then the application should evolve and deliver ongoing value.
